XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="HoleFoodsOutletCube" displayName="HoleFoods Outlet Cube" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="HoleFoods.Outlet" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="Outlet" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Country" allDisplayName="Country" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="Country.Region.Name" name="Region" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level sourceProperty="Country.Name" name="Country" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level sourceProperty="City" name="City" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceProperty="Population" name="Population" disabled="false" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> </cube>

XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="HoleFoodsTransactionCube" displayName="HoleFoods Transaction Cube" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="HoleFoods.Transaction" buildRestriction="Actual=1 And DateOfSale>TO_DATE('31-12-2012','DD-MM-YY')" countMeasureName="%COUNT" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" precompute="0"> <dimension name="Product" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="All Product" allDisplayName="Product" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="Product.Category" name="Product Category" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level sourceProperty="Product" name="Product Name" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> <property sourceProperty="Product.Name" name="Name" disabled="false" hidden="false" isName="true" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Channel Name" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="All Channel" allDisplayName="Channel" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="Channel" name="Channel Name" disabled="false" list="false" nullReplacement="No Channel" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Outlet" disabled="true" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Outlet" allDisplayName="Outlet" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level sourceProperty="Outlet.Country.Region.Name" name="Region" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level sourceProperty="Outlet.Country.Name" name="Country" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level sourceExpression="%source.Outlet.Country.Name_" "_%source.Outlet.City" name="City" disabled="false" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="DateOfSale" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All DateOfSale" allDisplayName="DateOfSale" sourceProperty="DateOfSale" type="time" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="FY Year Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" timeFormat="\F\Yy" timeOffset="-3m" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level name="FY Quarter Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="QuarterYear" timeFormat="\Qq\F\Y\y" timeOffset="-3m" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level name="Month Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level name="Day Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level name="Quarter" disabled="false" timeFunction="QuarterNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> <level name="Month" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure sourceProperty="AmountOfSale" name="Amount Sold" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" formatString="$#.##"></measure> <measure sourceProperty="UnitsSold" name="Units Sold" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <measure sourceExpression="%cube.DetermineBigSale(%source.Product.SKU,%source.UnitsSold,%source.AmountOfSale)" name="BigSale" disabled="false" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <relationship sourceProperty="Outlet.%ID" name="Outlet Cube" disabled="false" relatedCube="HoleFoodsOutletCube" cardinality="one"></relationship> <calculatedMember name="Junk Food" disabled="false" dimension="Product Type" valueExpression="Aggregate({[Product].[Candy], [Product].[Snack]})" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="Health Food" disabled="false" dimension="Product Type" valueExpression="Aggregate({[Product].[Fruit], [Product].[Seafodd]})" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <listing name="Listing" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="%ID,Product->SKU,DateOfSale,Outlet->City As "Outlet City",Product->Name As "Product Name",UnitsSold,AmountOfSale" orderBy="%ID,DateOfSale"></listing> <listing name="Geo Listing" disabled="false" listingType="map" fieldList="DateOfSale,%ID,Product->Name As "Product",AmountOfSale,Latitude,Longitude" orderBy="DateOfSale,%ID"></listing> </cube>

Method.name: DetermineBigSale
